title: kaNNan thiruvaDi
sahitya:
kaNNan tiruvaDi eNNuga maname tiNNam azhiyA vaNNam tarumE
anupallavi

 tarumE nidhiyum perumai pugazhum karu mAmEnip-perumAn ingE

caraNam

 nalamE nADIr pulavIr pADIr nila mAmaghaLin talaivan pugazhE
pugazh vIr kaNNan taghai shEramarar tOghaiyOD-asurappaghai tIrppavanE
